comments.body: Please add note explaining why you only need to set `get_default_interfaces` to `True` when calling from config but not facts.
Added a comment to the method header.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +84,88 @@        warnings = list()

        existing_interfaces_facts = self.get_interfaces_facts(get_default_interfaces=True)
        default_intf_list = existing_interfaces_facts.pop()
        commands.extend(self.set_config(existing_interfaces_facts, default_intf_list))
